version_description:
- Bug fixes. 
- Allow citizens and residents to specify the destination that they are planning to go to when asking for a curfew exemption permit (grocery stores, pharmacies, and hospitals).
- General enhancements and bug fixes.

* Add start/end permit notifications.
* Add permit expiry countdown.
* Show remaining permit hours.
* Add Success Partners page.
* Improvement password security.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.

* New interface. 
* Show medical appointments.
* Add a driver within a permit.
* Add announcement message.
* Show permit type.
* Adding new type of permits.
* Add Covid19 KSA MoH Dashboard.
* Enhancements on notifications.
* Show work and home locations.
* Possibility to change home/stay monthly.
* Set permitted area.
* Integration with Absher.
* Add about app page.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.

* New interface. 
* Show medical appointments.

* Show work and home locations.

* Add about app page.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.

* Show profile picture. 
* Enhance users info view.
* Enhance notifications.
* Enhance system messages.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.

* Update Success Partners.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.

* Adding Jog Permit.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.
* Security enhancements.

* Adding emergency medical permit.
* Adding permit for Qiyas examinee.
* Changing permit usage policy with each device.
* Adding new types/colors based on infraction (Quarantine, Infected).
* Integration with additional services.
* General enhancements and bug fixes.
* Security enhancements.
•Bug Fixes

• Adding Health status for user 
• Adding house leaving permit from and to restricted areas (Trial).
• Changing the password policy.
• Adding password changing from inside the application.

• Display health status in color coding.
• Enable Visitors to register into Tawakkalna.
• Display the result of Qiyas exams for students.
• General improvements.
